title: Fps lag Help patch 7.7
body:
Hello guys!
My problem is that my fps is really bad for some reason and i have pretty good pc and i dont know how to fix this problem. right now im in like 30 or less fps and its bothering me so much. I already tried to lower the graphics but it dont help :/
I hope you guys have a solution for this.

information about my pc if that helped
Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU N3050 1.60 Ghz
4gb ramm
64 bit operativsystem

Open to everything Thanks!

replies.body: I have the SAME PROBLEM! Ever since patch 7.7 I have FPS drops... this makes the game really impossible to enjoy. I have never had problems before this patch so exactly what has happened in 7.7 cause this... Riot assumes it is on your end (hardware) but I have seen multiple message boards with this same issue with 7.7...Dear RIOT, what is going on? Have you seen the other message boards? Just type in google search "League of Legends 7.7 FPS lag" It is not an isolated issue... so my question is what is being done about this?

It looks like that processor doesn't _quite_ meet the [minimum specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) for League. League requires at least a 2.0GHz processor in order to run properly.
Oh. Ok but can i do anything about it so i can play properly. is there anything i can do? i really wanna play this game without lags

Without the proper hardware, it'll be a little difficult to run League smoothly. You can check out our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some general fps troubleshooting, but overall the main cause of your low frames is probably due to that processor.
It can't be the processor because I have the same exact problem and I have a 2.4Ghz processor.

Sometimes the same issue can be caused by different things. For your fps, since your processor meets the minimum requirements, the cause of your low fps is probably hidden elsewhere. 

Without having much context for your specific issue, it's hard to troubleshoot, but the most common fixes can be found in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). Hit me back up if that doesn't help much!

i am having this problem i have been playing the game with everything on max and my fps was over 300 for over a year yet right when patch 7.7 came out i've been extremely laggy from fps drops i even lowered everything to the lowest possible with no change in the slightest. plz help
